emuInput.TitMainTitle: Two frames: Portrait of Rhonda Gail Lloyd, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd, wearing light colored outfit with ruffle, seated with raised left arm on floral and diamond patterned chair in home on 7604 Hamilton Avenue; Portrait of child wearing light colored overalls and short braids, seated on floral and diamond patterned chair in home of Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd on 7604 Hamilton Avenue
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1962, pg. 6 reads: Little Rhonda Gail Lloyd is a real glamour girl in the home of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd of 7604 Hamilton Ave.  Here she shows off some of her charm for Courier photographer Charles (Teenie) Harris..."Boy! Now I Really feel like kicking up my heels!" "
